text: Bozhidar Lukarski () (born 23 June 1972 in Pernik) is a Bulgarian politician and lawyer. He is the leader of Union of Democratic Forces since 2013. Since November 7, 2014 he is the Minister of Economy in the Second Borisov Cabinet. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:People from Pernik Category:Bulgarian lawyers Category:Bulgarian conservatives Category:Government ministers of Bulgaria Category:Union of Democratic Forces (Bulgaria) politicians
title: Bozhidar Lukarski
